title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4235.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4235.10 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) An application
fee of $250 must be paid to the corporation before final review of an
application can be completed. In the event the application is withdrawn or
rejected, the corporation shall promptly refund the application fee to the
applicant. (b) The corporation shall
assess a fee of up to three percent of each working capital loan payable by the
borrower at closing. The corporation shall assess a fee of up to one percent
per annum of each loan guarantee. The corporation may allocate the
administrative fee to cover project-related expenses it deems appropriate. In
addition, the borrower will be obligated to pay for all out-of- pocket expenses
incurred by the corporation related to working capital loans and loan
guarantees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

4235.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
